fields.name: version
fields.description: Message version (0x02 for this version). Note: the message version number is the same as for protocol versions 18 up to 22; select correct message version based on the protocol version supported by your firmware.

fields.name: reserved0
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: maxStartupStateDur
fields.description: Maximum time to spend in Acquisition state. If 0: bound disabled.

fields.name: reserved1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: flags
fields.description: PSM configuration flags

bits.name: reserved_bit0
bits.description: Reserved

bits.name: optTarget
bits.description:
Optimization target (not supported for protocol versions 32.00 and later)
000 performance (default)
001 power save
010 reserved
011 reserved
100 reserved
101 reserved
110 reserved
111 reserved

bits.name: extintSel
bits.description:
EXTINT pin select
0 EXTINT0
1 EXTINT1

bits.name: extintWake
bits.description:
EXTINT pin control
0 disabled
1 enabled, keep receiver awake as long as selected EXTINT pin is 'high'

bits.name: extintBackup
bits.description:
EXTINT pin control
0 disabled
1 enabled, force receiver into BACKUP mode when selected EXTINT pin is 'low'

bits.name: extintInactive
bits.description:
EXTINT pin control
0 disabled
1 enabled, force backup in case EXTINT pin is inactive for time longer than extintincactivityMs

bits.name: limitPeakCurr
bits.description:
Limit peak current
00 disabled
01 enabled, peak current is limited
10 reserved
11 reserved

bits.name: waitTimeFix
bits.description:
Wait for Timefix
0 wait for normal fix OK before starting on time
1 wait for time fix OK before starting on time

bits.name: updateRTC
bits.description:
Update real time clock
0 do not wake up to update RTC. RTC is updated during normal on-time.
1 update RTC. The receiver adds extra wake-up cycles to update the RTC. (not supported for protocol versions 23.00 to 23.01, and 32.00 and later)

bits.name: updateEPH
bits.description:
Update ephemeris
0 do not wake up to update Ephemeris data
1 update Ephemeris. The receiver adds extra wake-up cycles to update the Ephemeris data.

bits.name: reserved_bit13
bits.description: Reserved

bits.name: doNotEnterOff
bits.description:
Behavior of receiver in case of no fix
0 receiver enters (Inactive) Awaiting next search state
1 receiver does not enter (Inactive) Awaiting next search state but keeps trying to acquire a fix instead

bits.name: mode
bits.description:
Mode of operation
00 ON/OFF operation
01 cyclic tracking operation
10 reserved
11 reserved

bits.name: reserved_bit19
bits.description: Reserved

fields.name: updatePeriod
fields.description: Position update period. If set to 0, the receiver will never retry a fix and it will wait for external events (only affects the update period in ON/OFF operation for protocol versions 32.00 and later).

fields.name: searchPeriod
fields.description: Acquisition retry period if previously failed. If set to 0, the receiver will never retry a startup.

fields.name: gridOffset
fields.description: Grid offset relative to GPS start of week

fields.name: onTime
fields.description: Time to stay in Tracking state

fields.name: minAcqTime
fields.description: Minimal search time

fields.name: reserved2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: extintInactivityMs
fields.description: inactivity time out on EXTINT pin if enabled

fields.name: updatePeriod
fields.description: Position update period. If set to 0, the receiver will never retry a fix and it will wait for external events (only affects the update period in ON/OFF operation for protocol versions 32.00 and later).

fields.name: searchPeriod
fields.description: Acquisition retry period if previously failed. If set to 0, the receiver will never retry a startup.

fields.name: gridOffset
fields.description: Grid offset relative to GPS start of week

fields.name: onTime
fields.description: Time to stay in Tracking state

fields.name: minAcqTime
fields.description: Minimal search time

fields.name: reserved2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: extintInactivityMs
fields.description: inactivity time out on EXTINT pin if enabled

fields.name: version
fields.description: Message version (0x02 for this version)

fields.name: reserved1
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: maxStartupStateDur
fields.description: Maximum time to spend in Acquisition state. If 0: bound disabled (not supported in protocol versions 23 to 23.01).

fields.name: reserved2
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: flags
fields.description: PSM configuration flags

bits.name: optTarget
bits.description: Optimization target (000 performance (default), 001 power save, 010-011, 100-111 reserved)

bits.name: extintSel
bits.description: EXTINT pin select (0=EXTINT0, 1=EXTINT1)

bits.name: extintWake
bits.description: EXTINT pin control (0=disabled, 1=enabled, keep receiver awake as long as selected EXTINT pin is 'high')

bits.name: extintBackup
bits.description: EXTINT Pin Control (0=disabled, 1=enabled, force receiver into BACKUP mode when selected EXTINT pin is 'low')

bits.name: extintInactive
bits.description: EXTINT Pin Control (0=disabled, 1=enabled, force backup in case EXTINT pin is inactive for time longer than extintIncactivityMs)

bits.name: limitPeakCurr
bits.description: Limit peak current (00=disabled, 01=enabled, peak current is limited, 10-11 reserved)

bits.name: waitTimeFix
bits.description: Wait for Timefix (0=wait for normal fix OK before starting on time, 1=wait for time fix OK before starting on time)

bits.name: updateRTC
bits.description: Update Real Time Clock (0=do not wake up to update RTC, 1=update RTC, receiver adds extra wake-up cycles)

bits.name: updateEPH
bits.description: Update Ephemeris (0=do not wake up to update Ephemeris data, 1=update Ephemeris, receiver adds extra wake-up cycles)

bits.name: doNotEnterOff
bits.description: Behavior of receiver in case of no fix (0=receiver enters Inactive, 1=receiver does not enter Inactive but keeps trying to acquire a fix instead)

bits.name: mode
bits.description: Mode of operation (00=ON/OFF operation (PSMOO), 01=cyclic tracking operation (PSMCT), 10-11 reserved)

fields.name: updatePeriod
fields.description: Position update period. If set to 0, the receiver will never retry a fix and it will wait for external events.

fields.name: searchPeriod
fields.description: Acquisition retry period if previously failed. If set to 0, the receiver will never retry a startup.

fields.name: gridOffset
fields.description: Grid offset relative to GPS start of week

fields.name: onTime
fields.description: Time to stay in Tracking state

fields.name: minAcqTime
fields.description: minimal search time

fields.name: reserved3
fields.description: Reserved

fields.name: extintInactivityMs
fields.description: inactivity time out on EXTINT pin if enabled
